description: Blurring the lines between your favorite flannel and work jacket, the KÜHL Joyrydr™ has more than enough style and durability to take you from the crisp days of fall to the coldest days of winter. The soft fleece body lining adds warmth and insulation to this classic flannel, while the lined sleeves make for easy on/off. Generously cut for easy layering, the Joyrydr easily transitions from camp side chores to coffee house chill.
name: Kuhl Joyrydr - Mens
